column3:
A device which is designed or permits the end user to install
        software applications.

Is a hand-held pointing device that detects two-dimensional 
        motion relative to a surface.
Is a small device that a computer user pushes across a desk surface in order to point to a place on a display screen and to select one or more actions to take from that position
A laptop, sometimes called a notebook computer by manufacturers, is a battery- or AC-powered personal computer (PC) smaller than a briefcase
A device that consists of a lightproof chamber with an aperture fitted with a lens and a shutter through which the image of an object is projected onto a surface for recording.
A device with parts that cover each ear through which you can listen to something, such as music, without other people hearing.
